SEARCH
Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class MenuEditorController.MenuRow

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.MenuEditorController.MenuRow
Enclosing class:
MenuEditorController
public static class MenuEditorController.MenuRow extends Object
Data model representing a single menu item in the TableView. Provides observable JavaFX properties for automatic UI binding.

    • MenuRow

      public MenuRow(int id, String name, BigDecimal price)
      Constructs a new MenuRow object.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique database ID of the item.
      name - Display name of the menu item.
      price - Base price in USD.
